title: blocked with panic :runtime error: index out of range [0] with length 0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
v2.43.0
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
ubuntu 20.04
Commit hash: 
https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/commit/1106475e345d936aa1220ace3e95d746ec361fa4
Erigon Command (with flags/config):
./erigon  --chain=bor-mainnet --datadir  matic_data_archive --http.addr 0.0.0.0  --http.port 8547 --http.vhosts=192.168.0.108   --ws --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon --authrpc.port=8553   --torrent.port=62071   --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9092 --port=3330 --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall-api.polygon.technology/   --snapshots=true --p2p.protocol=66
Concensus Layer:

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network: 
polygon
#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
die loop  while downloading headers,says "runtime error: index out of range [0] with length 0, trace: [stageloop.go:132 panic.go:890 panic.go:113 btree_generic.go:522 btree_generic.go:779 header_algos.go:392
tage_headers.go:822 stage_headers.go:144 default_stages.go:36 sync.go:358 sync.go:260 stageloop.go:166 stageloop.go:94 asm_amd64.s:1598]"


this is log:
EROR[04-24|08:58:55.108] Staged Sync                              err="runtime error: index out of range [0] with length 0, trace: [stageloop.go:132 panic.go:890 panic.go:113 btree_generic.go:522 btree_generic.go:779 header_algos.go:392

````
[backtrace]
````

@justforfunya looks like a race-condition. if you can help us by run erigon as `go run -race ./cmd/erigon <your_cli_flags>` and see if there is any `WARNING: DATA RACE` output - feel free. If not - it's ok - we will try to reproduce by self.

@AskAlexSharov Hi I try go run cmd ,the error is the same with above and no other warnnings.
